hadith.text: Narrated Abu Najih As-Sulami: I heard the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) say: "Whoever shoots an arrow in the cause of Allah, then he has the reward of freeing a slave." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Sahih. Abu Najih is 'Amr bin 'Abasah As-Sulami, and 'Abdullah bin Al-Azraq is 'Abdullah bin Zaid
